org.prebake.util
Interface Clock

All Known Implementing Classes:
SystemClock
public interface Clock

Abstracts away System.nanoTime() so that unittests can easily test expirations.

See Also:
SystemClock

Method Summary
Modifier and Type Method and Description
 long nanoTime()
          A monotonically (non-strictly) increasing counter.
 void toCalendar(long nanoTime, java.util.Calendar cal)
          Converts a monotonic timestamp retrieved via nanoTime() from the same clock to a point in time representation.

toCalendar
